EmailTemplate.name: NS_EmailTemplate_Reinstate_Notification
EmailTemplate.Body:
Hello $!managerDisplayName,
The following user has been reinstated in the organization:
User Name : $!identityDisplayName Email : $!employeeEmail Manager : $!managerDisplayName Reinstate Date : $!reinstateDate
Kindly review and take necessary action if required.
Regards, Identity Management Team
EmailTemplate.Description: Notification to Manager after user reinstatement.
EmailTemplate.Subject: User Reinstatement Notification: $!identityDisplayName
